me anuwa ema bisawata wathhimi nam puthra yekuda athi wiya. indiyawe chalukya raja pelapatha awasana wuwayin pasuwa dakunu indiyawe pandya hoyisal kakatiya ha yadawa raja wanshayan washayen rajadhani hatharak athi wiya. 1268 di pandya deshaye raju bawata path marawarman kulashekara ge amathyawaraya buwanekabahu rajuge kalayedi lankawa aakramanaya kota yapahuwa watala raju mara dama dalada pathra dhathuwada paharagena pandya deshayata giyeya.arajika wu rajya thula sihasunata path wimata wathhimita me awasthawedi muslim welenda balaya wisin sahaya dakwana ladi.

amarasekarage nawakatha malawa pashchath yatath wijitha lankawe madhyama panthiye wikashanaya sanskruthika ha mathawadi thalaye sthanagatha karana athara ohu apeksha karana paramadarshi madhyama panthikaya yanu amarasekarage jathika chinthanaya adahana miniseki; lankawe sinhala bauddhayange ratak yayi adahana miniseki; jathikathwaya yayi kiyana de iwen men danna miniseki.
dinakata paminena rogin sankhyawa ekwara ihala giya nisa thamayi mewani thathwayak athiwune.

oya dannawada....hina thiyenne dakinna.samaharak hina sabawenawa,samaharak hina hinenwath ituwenne naha.eth minissu hinadakinawane.mamath ee wage hina dakinawa.oya aswalata wagema ee hinawalatath mama hugak aadareyi.ee aadare eka thanakata,eka deyakata laghu karanna puluwan deyak nowana nisayi ehema wenne.oya dannawada....oya thanikaralata konde gothagena ara lassana salwar eka adan enakota mata oyawa nargis wageyi.nargis ge punchi as dekatath wada mata oyage oya lokuas deka harima hadayi.ee asdekata mama hugak kamathiyi.aththamayi.oya dannawada....hithuwakkarakamata,punchi dewal oya lokuwata aragena oya lokuas punchiyata podi karagena math ekka kathanokara muna ellan innakota,samaharak welawata oya lokuas wala kadulu purawan innakota matath adenawa.ekama de oyata ee kadulu penne nathi eka witharayi.ee mama adanne as walin neme hithin nisa.oya dannawada....atawani edward rajjuruwo gana engalanthe hitapu.eya kirula dala giye eyage pemwathiya nisayi.brithanya kiritaye kirulata wada eyata eyage pema wadagath wuna.ayi ape saliya kumaraya ashokamala ekka giyeth premaya nisa kiyala kiyanne.mata nam ee widiyata athaharayanna kirulak nathiwunath matath puluwan oonema deyak athaarinna oya wenuwen habayi oya arenna.oya dannawada....oyata kiyanna thawath hugak dewal thiyenawa.ee dewal kiyanakam mata idadenawada oya "lobha badina loku as"dekata ebila oya as dekenmata mawama balaganna.sada kinithi nami wil diyata ebisoyayi seyawa sadeobe nethata ebi mage nethada sadasoyayi seyawa magesasala nowi wila thibena thuradileyi sada diyata yatinsasala wela diya kalabunadabideyi sada kabali pitinsasala nowi oba hidina thurapene ma obe nethinsasara pura sari sarana thurabalami lowa obe nethin.pa.li .me pinthura okkoma gugalgen."lobha badina lokuaswalin"pinthurayak illuwa.denna baha kiwa.dunnoth ekath dannamko.sinduwayu tiyubwalin.
